{"id":1080978140,"question_id":3176,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1697942039,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1080978140/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Sum of Mountain Triplets I","memory":"40.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minimumSum(int[] nums) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        \n        int sum = Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n        \n            \n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            for(int j=i+1; j<len; j++){\n                for(int k=j+1;k<len; k++){\n                    \n                    if(nums[i] < nums[j] && nums[k] < nums[j])\n                        sum = Math.min(sum, nums[i]+nums[j]+nums[k]);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return sum==Integer.MAX_VALUE? -1 : sum;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-sum-of-mountain-triplets-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
